title: Champion of Hephaestus
name: Volcaries - Champion of Hephaestus
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Volcaries you can Search
your deck for a Hephaestus and add it to
your hand. While Hephaestus is Enchanted
you may also use {fire} from your Underworld
to play Artifact Runes.
